title: About
text:
We are 4 organizers with a scientific background from different institutions. We all work or have worked on projects dealing with data-driven approaches for mapping groundwater parameters.

Ezra Haaf

Chalmers Tekniska Högskola: Gothenburg
 0000-0002-2746-0328

Tanja Liesch, Dr.

Karlsruhe Institute of Technology
 0000-0001-8648-5333

Maximilian Nölscher

Federal Institute for Geosciences and Natural Resources
 0000-0001-5606-1900

Marc Ohmer, Dr.

Karlsruhe Institute of Technology
 0000-0002-2322-335X

title: Challenge 2024
text: The Groundwater Spatial Modeling Challenge 2024 will be announced and started in April 2024 together with the EGU conference in Vienna. Therefore, further information will follow soon and latest in April.
